Check in was quick and easy although we never actually met Anna only John briefly. First impression the Private Studio -Room [not actually an apartment] is attached to the front of the family house. It is a short drive to cafes and shops for groceries [be alert of the little IGA at Salts and ask for a receipt and check your items as being a tourist strip they tried to overcharge].  
There is no off street parking but the lights from the house were on our car at all times. [we are not use  to living in suburbia] there is some house and road noise first thing in the morning but as we were out all day it did not bother us. A great central location to other seaside towns with in an hours drive.
Overall this studio- bedroom is ideal for a couple of days visit to this area and the value is very good. Thank you Anna.

We would happily recommend Anna's room and hospitality.
9436331: We had a fantastic time staying at Anna's apartment and she was the perfect host - very generous, affable, flexible and responsive wherever the need arose. The place is absolutely clean, fresh and spotless and, contrary to the  comments I noted in another review, we had no issue with the mattress or other amenities (coffee machine was great!). I also hate soft mattresses and will quite comfortably sleep on the floor if I have to, but this wasn't an issue. We also had the benefit of complimentary gym membership nearby - indoor/outdoor pools, gym classes, yoga & coffee! A great activity option if the weather isn't so fine. Yes the unit faces the main local Casuarina thoroughfare but this didn't bother us at all - by day we're busy and by night it's quiet so we didn't miss out on our sleep! We were happy enough at times to be kicking back reading a book too, so it really wasn't an issue for us. This is not the main road between coastal suburbs either which would be a much different scenario.We are a family of 3 with a 10yr old - and 3 road bikes kept inside the apartment too! - but we managed just fine as we're pretty organised and tidy. Anna and family made us all feel welcome and our son had a great time getting to hang out with her children occasionally as well. We wouldn't hesitate to stay there again and Casuarina itself is well set-up and a very smart, idyllic area with bike paths and easy access to nearby shops, beaches and Kingscliff if you want more restaurants and action. Thanks again Anna & family!

We never saw our host; we talked on phone and communicated via text, which was faine with us.

Noisy vehicle traffic during the day but blessedly quiet at night. Double glazing of front would improve that experience.
Good location, close to Kingscliff and to a resort shopping centre with a well stocked and friendly IGA.

Taking into account to the high cost of living in this country, I think the price is cosiderably reasonable for the room she offers, which is really helpful for a budget traveller like us. 

Located in a very quiet and nice residential area, we could take a nice walk to the beach, although it was too windy and rough to swim with kids. If it were connected to public transportation and possible to move around without renting a car, it would have been nicer, but maybe that kind of "convenience" would not be something to expect in a quiet residential area...

All in all, I would totally recommend her place to my friends if they happen to be in need of staying in GC city, especially to those who are with young kids. 

Thank you very much Anna for your hospitality!

Lastly, I find Airbnb is a really good system which gives you an opportunity to experience the local life from day one in a place where first time you visit. This is not possible staying in a hotel. 21192207: The Burrow Apartment and BBQ Terrace-Pets Welcome

In a word - unique. Furnished with original Danish pieces and retro art, the Burrow was purpose built in the 1960s and features timber paneling, exposed brick, stone floors and a large elevated private courtyard with new Weber BBQ - all with wonderful ocean and river views. The Burrow boasts a massive fully fenced yard and is 10 minutes from Gold Coast Airport, 5 minutes from Coolangatta and Kingscliffe and 40 minutes to beautiful Byron.'

452047: We had a wonderful stay at Catherine and Tim's place. The location was very unique - peaceful and secluded yet so close to the delights of Kingscliff. 23647314:
Such a treat to stay with Catherine & Tim!

The space suited my needs perfectly, with separate lounge, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom.
The lounge was comfy, with large TV (WiFi, NetFlix, AppleTV, etc). Books & games on hand.
The bed and linen was luxurious. 
The bathroom had a washing machine, and even the laundry cupboard was stocked with first aid supplies as well as many thoughtful little extras to make you feel at home.

The kitchen was equipped with everything I hoped for, and much, much more. 
The pantry was well stocked with staples and simple options for breakfast or an evening meal.
The fridge held eggs plus milk, butter etc. A bowl of beautiful fruit welcomed me, along with honey from their own hives and home made jam. 

Catherine certainly goes the extra mile to pamper her guests :)

Woolworths is 10mins away, but there'd be plenty on hand to get you through the first night if necessary.

The weather was showery during my stay, but I loved sitting out on the back porch enjoying the garden, the day old chicks nearby and the visiting birds. 

In the distance I could hear the roar of the ocean. Very peaceful.

It was so interesting to wander around the farm, with all the different trees, and beautiful views over the Tweed Valley. Later a most informative walk with Catherine, asking questions and learning about tropical fruit.

Truly a home away from home and I look forward to visiting again.

We had a great 2 night stay at Catherine & Tim's unit.  The unit is joined to the main house but is perfectly private.  It is spotlessly clean and everything has been provided and thought of.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable, there was a well stocked pantry with all the basics and a little backyard with a bbq for own use.  Plenty of fresh eggs, jam, honey, fruit etc. for breakfast and homemade cookies and coffee/tea choices. Wifi is free and very fast.  
We did a lovely evening stroll around the fruit orchards and gardens accompanied by their 2 friendly old dogs.  On Catherine's suggestion we went for a swim at her favourite beach (using the beach towels kindly provided).  We also took a drive to Murwillimbah which was very scenic and  visited the regional art gallery there which has fabulous views across to Mt. Warning and a wonderful display of Margaret Olley art.  
We would certainly recommend a stay at 'Beachfarm' and hope to return again ourselves soon.

Shampoo, soap and nice fresh towels are supplied. The accommodation is clean with lovely crisp sheets on the beds.  Assorted DVDS and books are also accessible along with WiFi.

I cannot fault this accommodation and hope to return in the not too distant future.

I would recommend this to anyone wanting a relaxing break where you also want to spend some time relaxing at the apartment reading, or watching movies, or sleeping in. Large private courtyard to dine al fresco and enjoy a cuppa in the sunshine. The space is quiet and private and feels like home away from home. Super comfortable bed, beautifully furnished, and even a large selection of dvd's to keep you occupied. Was there as a family of four, so plenty of space in the apartment for 4 of use with 2 bathrooms and big, fully equipped kitchen, but if you are not the cooking type plenty of cafes and restaurants downstairs and only a short walk to Coolangatta strip with loads more bars, cafes and restaurants, coles and woolies also close by if you are staying more than a few days and need to stock up
Really can't fault this place, great spot, great view and comfy apartment
 we will be back
:-)

Firstly, communication with Trent and Tracy was great, and they made check in very easy. Tracy met with me to go through everything, as well as let me know some bars and restaurants to check out.

The kitchen and living room are spacious, with a TV equipped with a hard drive full of great movies. The balcony is quite large, and great for enjoying a wine or two in the afternoon or evening, with exceptional views of Kirra Beach and across to Surfers Paradise.
The bedroom sizes are very generous, and it was great having a walk-in robe as well as an ensuite in the main bedroom.
We had an amazing stay at Trent's place and would definitely love to return there for future trips to the Gold Coast!

We were worried about the proximity to the airport, but it didn't bother us at all (the planes fly out towards currumbin, so no noise where we were).

Trent's apartment is the perfect getaway. Everything you expect and more. Neat as a pin, cosy, luxurious... AMAZING VIEW of ocean in the front, sunset from the side. Perfect for our family with small children. (high chair, stroller, travel cot all provided.

Trent was a pleasure to deal with and very accommodating when our plans changed and we had to check in later.

We will definitely be back. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Thanks Trent :)
20927554:
This place is AMAZING! The elevator opens up to the apartment which I thought was pretty cool. The entire place is well organized with everything you need like utensils/TV with movies/Towels/WIFI. The views are amazing during sunrise and sunset even through your bedroom. You can see the beautiful Brisbane skyline from the balcony.
The neighborhood is great too with everything you need all close by! MAKE SURE TO CHECK OUT TUPE ALOHA, a little Mexican restaurants 30 seconds away.  Get DAN to mix you up a great drink or a shot! The staff are super friendly, my friends and I literally got a job there due to how often we were day during our trip. The beach is literally one step away! We are definitely going to come back to this place and recommend it to everyone!
43918119: We had an amazing stay, the hosts were awesome and we definitely recommend this apartment to everyone!
40356542: Trent’s apartment was an amazing find; excellent location, beautiful views and a modern, yet cosy apartment. Trent had everything you could possibly need, was definitely our home away from home. We had such an amazing stay. Thanks Trent!
34166626:
We chose Trent's apartment for the location. The views from the apartment are absolutely stunning at anytime of the day or night and extend from Rainbow Bay to Surfers Paradise.
Trent welcomed us and showed us through the apartment at the beginning of our 10 day stay and was available if we required anything during our stay. The direct lift access into the apartment is a bonus making packing and unpacking a vehicle a lot easier.
It very comfortably accommodated our family of 6. Our 2 young grandchildren slept on the sofa bed in the study at night and when it was folded away during the day, it became their play area with their own TV.
Modern, comfortable furnishings, appliances and equipment enhance the experience.   You will find everything you need to make your stay enjoyable.
There are a variety of cafes, restaurants and bars close by and at Coolangatta catering for all tastes.  
We will always remember our time here.
4810674: This apartment is stunning! The highlight is the panoramic view of the Gold Coast which lets you watch the many changing colours of the Gold Coast skyline. The location is fantastic, and away from the hustle and bustle of other parts of the coast. The apartment is spacious and a great place to relax and unwind.
5926310:
My family and I stayed at Trent's apartment for 3 days only, what it was a shame....we were amused by the apartment and the view in the first minutes inside it! Everything so clean and well prepared to the guest as a hotel would do it! 
Perfect location, my favourite place on the Gold Coast!
Unfortunately we couldn't extend our stay otherwise we would it! We'll definitely stay there when back.
37084972: From the moment you walk in to this spacious apartment it makes you feel relaxed. We stayed mon-fri and didn't really need to leave as there was everything that you need right there, loved the amazing views from the big balcony right out over the ocean. loved the selection of movies, great internet connection, close to cafes and a short walk to the supermarket.Trent is fantastic to deal with and will answer any question you have. We will be coming back in the future. Thanks again Trent :)
35025885: We stayed for 2 nights at Trents apartment and it was absolutely beautiful! The views were amazing, the apartment was spacious and so accommodating with everything you could possibly need! Thanks again Trent we had the best weekend away!! We will definitely be back!!
41511446: Incredible views, every moment we could we were looking out the windows or sitting on the veranda. Very comfortable space to be in. The apartment was spacious and relaxing. Absolutely no complains. Would definitely stay again.
39289214: It is a lovely place to stay in Gold Coast. The view from the balcony is amazing.  And it is a modern new flat with everything we need. Highly recommended for several friends and a family to stay for holidays.
16437900:

22966998:
The apartment was modern,spacious, clean,secure and had a
 lovely northerly aspect capturing all day sun.The view was amazing and the balcony was a perfect place to sit and relax. Easy access to restaurants,shops,beach and esplanade. Trent was prompt to reply and very helpful. A very enjoyable stay! Thank you.

What a great apartment! Great location just a cross from Kirra beach, beautiful views, plenty of cafes and coolangatta just a short walk away.

The apartment itself is beautiful with everything you could want for a holiday or a weekend away with fabulous views over the beach and also to the hinterland. Our whole family enjoyed our time here and we'll definitely be coming back.

27266084: Lovely place to spend time with family and friends

86073157: We had an amazing week staying at Trent’s place. The place was so well stocked and so comfortable. Our family had such a wonderful time and the place was great value for money. Location was amazing! We highly recommend this place to families. Five stars!
102561073: Trent’s place is fabulous! The apartment was huge and amazing. It is right in front of beach and very close to eateries and malls. Everything is neat and clean. We have a great stay and cant bear to return home!
7471032: This apartment is stunning !! The views are incredible and the location is perfect. Everything you need is there such as bottle shop, grocers, bakery and restaurants. 10 minute walk to coolangatta which has lovely shops etc.. we will defo return.
10332992: Great place, great location - would not hesitate to stay again, absolutely wonderful in every way!
8955683: The apartment is comfortable for 8 of us (5 adults and 3 kids). It is a beautiful place with great ocean view and walkable to the beach.

85898167: This Airbnb was amazing. Right in front of the beach and right above/next to some amazing restaurants. The place was very clean and had an amazing view as well. Definitely recommend. Tracy was also very helpful and kind and just an all around great host.
35435539: Thank you Trent and Tracy for trying to help us to connect to the wifi. The apartment has great views, rooms are clean, well-equipped kitchen. Near shopping centres and supermarkets. Well rested for the 4 nights stay.

26410015: Lovely and awesome place. Private and clean. It was a great place for friends to stay together!
7662497: It had been a wonderful time at Trent's place. Our messages were answered promptly throughout. Upon arrival, we were warmly welcomed by Tracy who orientated us around the place. 57873910: The apartment is beautiful and in a great location.  It was lovely to be across the street from a gorgeous beach.  There were good restaurants within a short walk. And thank for the housekeeper give us this perfect room! Appreciate very much.
51026758: really like the house~near the sea,good location,beautiful view~
21618553:
Trent's apartment was all it was made out to be. It overlooks Kirra Beach. So it made having a walk, run or a swim to be quite a breeze.

Needless to say, this also meant the chef - if one was minded to do a spot of cooking - would be having a pretty amazing view when preparing the next meal. As for the meals, don't hesitate to use the table on the balcony. Why miss out on that view? :) 

Bakeries (do check out the pies), cafes, pharmacy and a 7-11 were also situated within very short walking distance. There are bars and other restaurants situated further down as well. (If you have young kids, do bring the young 'uns to the playground across the 7-11 or bakery.)

There were small touches as well which the host did not speak about on their Airbnb page. Movies for everyone and some games to keep the kids occupied. The kids can easily spend hours on this if need be. 

The unit was just a single storey unit but it was sufficiently spacious to accommodate the 7-8 people that stayed over with me.

All in all, we had a very enjoyable stay.
43998935: Except for some hiccups before checkin, all went well. The apt was clean and modern with all small details thrown in.... Kids love the pool too!
39921973: Trent was very accommodating to allow us to check-in early at 11am and check-out later at 12pm due to our flight schedule. Very nice place that we enjoyed. 29360628: Everything was perfect! Isabella was very accommodating to our itinerary, coming down to the theme parks to hand us our keys and also responding to our queries promptly. 45358328: Thank you Trent and Elizabath by providing this spacious, neat and comfy home for us. The view at the balcony was stunning. Everything as promised and sometimes even exceeded our expectations. We enjoyed our stay in Coolangatta and highly recommend this apartment for your consideration.
41124875: My family reallllllly love the place and they said they dont want to leave the house.   I can tell everyone the accommodation is exactly perfect and nice! Just as advertised - new, spotlessly clean, spacious and a great location.

10889170:
My children and I had a wonderful stay at Trent's apartment. Trent was fab, responding to questions promptly and meeting us at the apartment.
The apartment itself was fantastic! Views of  Kirra beach, watching the sun set behind Surfers in the distance was a highlight.
The apartment is well stocked with cooking facilities but there are so many restaurants close by, you may not need them . Great pizza, an amazing veggie restaurant, a bakery... All within walking distance and at Coolangatta, a 20 min walk along the beach, is an Aldi supermarket.
The apartment was of a high standard and the most comfy doonas and pillows! Even my kids remarked on the comfortable beds! 
From a family point of view, the telly was amazing and Trent had all the latest movies for us which was great. 
If I can ever return to The Gold Coast, I would stay here again...... Fingers crossed!
Thank you Trent!
14669573: Our host was wonderful.  Thank you Trent!  The apartment was beautiful, modern, views were spectacular.  It was close to shopping, good restaurants, the beach was at your doorstep.  Fantastic stay!
20785064:
Our flight arrived early in the morning and the apartment was just 15mins away from the Collongata (Website hidden by Airbnb) was helpful to get the place ready earlier than the check in time. the place is clean and tidy. We have enjoyed our stay and surely would like to stay here again on my future trip.
34620541:

Trent is a great host who was very helpful and prompt in communication. We had a fantastic and memorable holiday. Highly recommend this place for a relaxing, quiet and comfortable stay! Thank you Trent.
18514798: The place was absolutely amazing - views were breathtaking. Small touches like having fresh flowers in the apartment were lovely. 150330343: Increíble departamento! Muy amplio y la vista impresionante. Definitivamente lo recomiendo.
159539005: 非常感谢Trent给我们提供了非常干净整洁的住所,住所里生活用品俱全,住房很新很漂亮,在客厅里可以眺望大海,外面的景色尽收眼底,阳台很大很宽敞,与朋友喝杯咖啡看看景色感到很惬意,吃饭购物都很方便,出门过马路就是海滩,去海边游泳很方便｡再一次谢谢Trent!下次过来一定还借这幢公寓｡
105105245: 超级棒的海景大房子,下楼过马路即是海滩,超大落地门窗阳台,坐在屋里即可享受海边美景,房间干净整洁设施齐全,房东Tracy很友好热情,我们到的比较早所以先去吃午餐,Tracy特意开车找到我们送来房门钥匙,非常感谢｡公寓楼下即是各种饭店及超市,公交车站,出行吃饭散步都十分方便,楼下和公寓楼外还有烧烤设备,真是方便极了,强烈推荐
5858474:

22108819: Private Studio apartment - Close to Kirra beach

This newly built fully self contained Studio Apartment has its own private access to your stay and a beautiful private court yard to relax in the sun for happy hour or your morning coffee. 5 mins drive to the beautiful beaches of Kirra and Coolangatta and the fantastic restaurants and cafes they offer. 5 mins drive to Strandshopping centre which hosts many amazing restaurants and cafes, lots of retail shops, Woolies and the cinemas. 7mins to the Gold Coast airport. 10 min walk to IGA.'

46698790: Friendly and obliging host. The place was in a nice, quiet neighbourhood with close proximity to public transport and about 3km from Coolangatta. It is a good sized studio and it is great value for money.

Would definetly recommend Donna’s guesthouse and if I ever find myself in need of somewhere to stay in the area again, I would choose here.

Donna said she could be contacted on her mobile at any time but we did not need to. Everything was in order for our four day stay.
